r.d: A unified interface for checking the availability services on external servers and sending meaningful alerts through a variety of media if a service becomes unavailable.
r.n: Implements changes proposed by Justin Patrin in his conditional vote (http://pear.php.net/pepr/pepr-vote-show.php?id=171&handle=justinpatrin). Also fixes bug #3102 and implements a test for HTTPS. Monitor now uses references instead of variable copying for manipulation of alerter and client objects, thereby reducing memory overhead (thanks to Ian Eure for this suggestion). Finally, all tests are now in phpt format.
